name: docker-run
description: Helper feature to run Docker images inside devcontainers using docker-outside-of-docker. Provides a simple wrapper and example package names to pass to 'docker run'.

images.description: A comma-separated list of Docker image names to suggest for 'docker run' (e.g., 'hello-world'). You can also include common runtime params/options when suggesting examples, for example: '-it', '--rm', '-p 8080:80'.
